channel.title: Help - Sometimes d claws hit fast and sometimes they hit slow :( lots of info
channel.description:
Hey guys, i just added d claws, and im pretty aggravated. I added the attack animation, which i "borrowed" from torag's hammers. Then, sometimes the claws would hit up to 3 hits per second, and later it would be 1 per turn. this is strange :( I am currently using Richscape 4.0 as a source. Thanks for reading To sum it all up in a couple of pictures: [b]I want this:[/b] [img]http://www.shrani.si/f/2m/b6/3w4RFiSg/good.jpg[/img] [b]I dont want this :eek: :[/b] [img]http://www.shrani.si/f/2F/cI/16HyBwbh/bad.jpg[/img]
Postin my item.config, for d claws: [code]item = 8002 Dragon_claws A_set_of_fighting_clawz 2304900 2300000 2300000 40 45 -4 0 0 13 26 7 0 0 0 0 60[/code] Also this from Player.java: [code] if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) { return 2068; }[/code] Please help! -Bekilo

item.title: Help - Sometimes d claws hit fast and sometimes they hit slow :( lots of info
item.dc:creator: @bekilo bekilo
item.description:
@bekilo wrote:

lol how?
Sorry, i’m new to these servers, and i dont know much, maybe you could like, tell me how?

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Sometimes d claws hit fast and sometimes they hit slow :( lots of info

item.description:
@r34p4g3pk wrote:

Change the attack timer.

Read full topic

item.title: Help - Sometimes d claws hit fast and sometimes they hit slow :( lots of info
item.dc:creator: @bekilo bekilo
item.description:
@bekilo wrote:

Hey guys, i just added d claws, and im pretty aggravated.
I added the attack animation, which i “borrowed” from torag’s hammers.
Then, sometimes the claws would hit up to 3 hits per second, and later it would be 1 per turn.
this is strange
I am currently using Richscape 4.0 as a source.
Thanks for reading
To sum it all up in a couple of pictures:
I want this:

I dont want this :eek: :

Postin my item.config, for d claws:

item = 8002	Dragon_claws	A_set_of_fighting_clawz	2304900	2300000	2300000	40	45	-4	0	0	13	26	7	0	0	0	0	60

Also this from Player.java:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8002) { return 2068; }
Please help!
-Bekilo
